content:
## Section 12: Badge Component ### 12.1 Component Overview **Description**: Small status indicators and labels with semantic color coding. Used for transaction statuses, notification counts, and feature labels. **Pattern**: Inline badges using utility classes (no dedicated component file) **When to Use**: - ✅ Transaction status (success, pending, failed) - ✅ KYC verification status - ✅ Notification counts - ✅ Feature labels (NEW, BETA) - ✅ Settlement status indicators --- ### 12.2 Badge Pattern #### Base Badge Structure ```tsx Badge Text ``` **Core Classes**: - `px-3 py-1`: Padding (12px horizontal, 4px vertical) - `rounded-full`: Pill shape - `text-xs font-medium`: Typography (12px, 500 weight) - `border`: 1px border --- ### 12.3 Semantic Color Variants #### Success Badge ```tsx Success // Use Cases: - Completed transactions - Verified KYC - Active accounts - Approved requests ``` #### Error/Failed Badge ```tsx Failed // Use Cases: - Failed transactions - Rejected KYC - Declined payments - Error states ``` #### Warning Badge ```tsx Pending // Use Cases: - Pending transactions - In-review KYC - Awaiting approval - Processing status ``` #### Info Badge ```tsx Info // Use Cases: - Informational labels - New features (NEW) - Beta features (BETA) - General status ``` #### Neutral Badge ```tsx Inactive // Use Cases: - Inactive accounts - Disabled features - Neutral status ``` --- ### 12.4 Size Variants #### Small Badge ```tsx Small // Dimensions: ~8px vertical, 16px horizontal // Font: 10px // Use: Compact layouts, notification counts ``` #### Medium Badge (Default) ```tsx Medium // Dimensions: ~8px vertical, 24px horizontal // Font: 12px (text-xs) // Use: Standard badges, most common ``` #### Large Badge ```tsx Large // Dimensions: ~12px vertical, 32px horizontal // Font: 14px (text-sm) // Use: Prominent labels, hero sections ``` --- ### 12.5 Special Purpose Badges #### Notification Count Badge ```tsx

TXN{transaction.id} {statusBadge[transaction.status]}
₹{transaction.amount.toLocaleString('en-IN')}
); }; ``` --- #### Example 2: KYC Verification Status ```tsx const KYCStatus = ({ status }) => { const badges = { verified: ( ✓ Verified ), pending: ( ⏳ In Review ), rejected: ( ✗ Rejected ), not_started: ( Not Started ), }; return (
KYC Status {badges[status]}
); }; ``` --- #### Example 3: Notification Bell with Count ```tsx const NotificationBell = ({ count }) => { return ( ); }; ``` --- #### Example 4: Feature Labels ```tsx const FeatureCard = ({ title, isNew, isBeta }) => { return (

{title}

{isNew && ( NEW )} {isBeta && ( BETA )}

Feature description...

 ); }; ``` --- #### Example 5: Settlement Status Grid ```tsx const SettlementStatus = ({ settlements }) => { const statusColors = { settled: 'bg-green-500/20 text-green-400 border-green-400/30', processing: 'bg-blue-500/20 text-blue-400 border-blue-400/30', pending: 'bg-yellow-500/20 text-yellow-400 border-yellow-400/30', failed: 'bg-red-500/20 text-red-400 border-red-400/30', }; return (
{settlements.map((settlement) => (

{settlement.merchant}

{settlement.date}

₹{settlement.amount.toLocaleString('en-IN')} {settlement.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + settlement.status.slice(1)}
))}
); }; ``` --- ### 12.7 Accessibility #### WCAG Compliance - **Contrast**: All badge colors meet WCAG 2.2 AA (4.5:1 minimum) - Green: `text-green-400` on `bg-green-500/20` = 4.8:1 - Red: `text-red-400` on `bg-red-500/20` = 5.1:1 - Yellow: `text-yellow-400` on `bg-yellow-500/20` = 4.6:1 - Blue: `text-blue-400` on `bg-blue-500/20` = 4.7:1 #### Screen Reader Support ```tsx // Add sr-only text for context Transaction status: Success // Or use aria-label on parent
Success
``` --- ### 12.8 Anti-Patterns ❌ **Using Too Many Colors** ```tsx // WRONG: Rainbow badges confuse meaning Custom Random // CORRECT: Stick to semantic colors Success Failed ``` ❌ **Badge Text Too Long** ```tsx // WRONG: Defeats purpose of badge This is a very long badge text that wraps // CORRECT: Keep it concise Success ``` ❌ **Inconsistent Badge Styling** ```tsx // WRONG: Different styles for same purpose Success Failed // CORRECT: Consistent styling Success Failed ``` ---
